agency_desc: A nonprofit agency committed to empowering adults to prevent child sexual abuse.
service_description: Offers a 24-hour helpline for support and information about childhood sexual abuse. Trained crisis counselors provide information to help adults recognize the signs of child sexual abuse and respond appropriately to a child's disclosure of abuse. This line also provides answers to questions about mandatory reporting and referrals to local resources.
site_details: Call, text, or visit the website for information.
